thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com | 6 of 110
thread.title: Carole Windell

author: Carole Windell
title: Carole Windell
text: I have been using EZ catering for a little over 2 years. I generally have need to order approximately once a month from them. I have only one mishap with a delivery being very late (driver was in car accident). Otherwise, all my deliveries have been on time. Most of the restaurants I have used food is above average in quality and never have had too little food. My only 2 issues are that sometimes the food arrives a little to early (1/2 hour before the delivery time specified) and that if you try to place a same day order, the selection of restaurants becomes very limited.
